Products.name: Starlight
Products.description: Level up your style game with Starlight, equipped with a 51mm (2.01) HD display, Bluetooth calling, stainless steel design IP68, water resistance and more.

Products.name: Ninja 3 Plus
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Ninja 3 Plus features a 1.83 HD display 200 mAh battery capacity 118 sports modes inbuilt gamesvoice assistant and much more

Products.name: Asteroid
Products.description: Elevate your lifestyle with the Asteroid Smartwatch - a fusion of style and tech, featuring a stunning 36.3mm (1.43) AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling and low power consumption.

Products.name: Rock
Products.description: Upgrade your lifestyle and take control of your day with the AMOLED Display Smartwatch. Our smartwatch lets you easily track your fitness goals, and even control your music without ever having to pull out your phone.

Products.name: Legacy
Products.description: Fireboltt Legacy - A Luxurious & Feature rich smartwatch Featuring a 36.3mm (1.43) AMOLED Display with wireless charging and much more

Products.name: Invincible Plus
Products.description: Fire-Boltt is introducing the ultimate luxury smartwatch - INVINCIBLE PLUS - a true masterpiece of technology and design featuring an AMOLED Display, Bluetooth calling, 4 GB storage, and much more!

Products.name: Quantum
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Quantum is the ultimate fashion accessory for modern trendsetters. This smartwatch is designed selectively that combines the latest technology with timeless elegance. The metal chain strap gives you a secure fit while the full-color touchscreen display keeps you connected on the go.

Products.name: Epic Plus
Products.description: Shop for Fire-Boltt Epic plus that comes with a 1.83″ HD Display, IP67 water resistance, female health care, SpO2 monitoring, weather updates, camera control, and music control
Products.description2: Track your own Oxygen levels. Be aware of the changing levels of oxygen in your blood and take the right steps in advance to keep it balanced.

Products.name: Ninja Fit
Products.description: Introducing Fire-Boltt Ninja Fit, an ultimate fitness companion. With our cutting-edge technology, the way you track and achieve your fitness goals will be changed for always.
Products.description2: View bigger on the screen with our largest 42.9mm (1.69”) HD display covering every edge possible with a design that gives you the best screen experience ever on a smartwatch.

Products.name: Fire-Boltt Cobra
Products.description: FireBoltt Cobra is the pinnacle of a rugged and sturdy Smartwatch. Backed by advanced technology to tackle outdoor activities with ease. It features an AMOLED Display with Bluetooth calling and tons of other features.

Products.name: Supernova
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Supernova with sharp 45.2mm (1.78) AMOLED display smartwatch, Bluetooth calling, voice assistant, 123 sports modes, an inbuilt mic & speaker, and inbuilt games
Products.description2: Running, cycling, swimming, and more – choose your favourite type of workout from 123 DIFFERENT SPORTS MODES. Supernova will keep a track of every step, every lap, and every stat to help you crush those fitness goals

Products.name: Ninja Call Pro Plus
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Ninja Call Pro Plus with largest 46mm (1.83 inch) display, Bluetooth calling, 100+ sports mode and more.
Products.description2: Running, cycling, swimming, and more – choose your favourite workout from 100+ different sports modes. The Ninja Call Pro is here to keep a track of every step, every lap, and every stat to help you crush those fitness goals.

Products.name: Ultimate
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Ultimate features stainless steel design, a 1.39 HD Display- Bluetooth calling multiple -sports modes inbuilt -games and much more

Products.name: Vogue
Products.description: Rediscover your style with Vogue’s stainless steel design, a stunning 52mm (2.05”) HD display with 428*518 pixels resolution, IP68 water resistance, and wireless charging.

Products.name: Hunter
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Hunter features a 51mm (2.01) HD Display- Bluetooth calling- 120+ sports modes-voice assistant-IP67 water resistance- and more.

Products.name: Ring
Products.description: Now, manage all your communication with your Fire-Boltt Smartwatch featuring Bluetooth Calling with an inbuilt mic and speaker. Make, receive or reject calls straight from your wrist. Seize the view with a 44.5mm (1.75'' inch) Full Touch, High-Definition Large Display.

Products.name: Blizzard
Products.description: Introducing the epitome of luxury and technology - our state-of-the-art smartwatch. Crafted with precision and care, this watch is the ultimate companion for the modern-day individual who values style and sophistication, without sacrificing functionality.

Products.name: Rocket
Products.description: Shop for the Fire-Boltt Rocket smartwatch with a 33mm (1.3) HD round full touch display- Bluetooth calling 100+ sports modes- voice assistant- SpO2 monitoring- and smart notifications

Products.name: Tank
Products.description: Shop for Fire-Boltt Tank Smartwatch with Bluetooth Calling, 46.5mm (1.85″) inch Display, 123 sports mode, SpO2 Monitoring, Voice Assistant, and IP67 water resistant

Products.name: Combat
Products.description: Fire-Boltt Combat is a sporty & rugged smartwatch with a 1.95 HD display- BT calling- 150+ Sports Modes- voice assistant- long battery life- military grade toughness- health suite and much more.

Product.title: New Caravan Optics
Product.description: eyeglasses_aviator; eyeglasses_men-s; eyeglasses_new-arrivals; eyeglasses_new_icons; eyeglasses_view-all; eyeglasses_women-s

Product.title: JACK
Product.description: As edgy as it is smooth, Jack is pure Ray-Ban fusion. The slim metal frame is a new riff on two i-shape icons – Round and Hexagonal – and comes in Gold, Silver, Gunmetal and Black. Its new bi-gradient lenses are designed to give extra shade where you need it most. Choose from 3 chalky soft color groupings: Grey-Pink-Blue, Grey-Clear-Blue and Brown-Clear-Blue.

Product.title: INVERNESS
Product.description: Straight from the vault, the '70s Inverness is back with its rugged edge. This popular legend takes its name from the Scottish town where the shape was first debuted. Available with solid and gradient lenses, including green and blue, and two polarized options. This bold acetate shape stands out from the crowd with its highlighted edgy surface.

Product.title: AVIATOR TOTAL BLACK
Product.description: One of the most iconic sunglass models in the world, the Ray-Ban Aviator was originally designed for U.S. aviator pilots in 1937. Today it’s a symbol of classic American style and performance quality. For this release, the heritage model gets a total blackout: black metal frame and temple tips with black Polarized lenses. Aviator Total Black is slick, clean and heroically sharp.

Product.title: CLUBMASTER SQUARE
Product.description: Straight from the vault, made famous by innovative artists and intellectuals, the Clubmaster represents the gold standard in contemporary fashion. Available in a variety of lens colours, such as green, grey and blue, which perfectly match the slim frame, Clubmaster Square delivers top-quality comfort while knowing how to turn heads.

Product.title: OLYMPIAN II
Product.description: Olympian II shines with natural confidence and is easy to spot. From the beach to the concrete jungle, this frame takes your sporty lifestyle to Olympic levels. Available in many colour combinations, from classic black to shiny rose gold frame options and from green to brown lens options. This soft rectangular shape has an elevated bridge for a streamlined silhouette.

Product.title: RB4337
Product.description: Choose this octagonal unisex shape to see and be seen. Made for the younger market segment, this frame is effortless enough for your most-worn-in sweatshirt and elegant enough for the fanciest day out. Available in many colours, from grey-on-grey to eye-catching white frames, this shape knows how to turn heads. Comfortable on your face and available in dark or gradient lenses, this frame is for those who dare to be timeless and trendy

Product.title: RECTANGLE 1969 MIRROR EVOL
Product.description: Choose a lens that changes colour faster than the others and that provides excellent visibility with a mirror effect to reflect the daring spirit of iconic models. Our iconic Rectangle 1969 now features upgraded Evolve light-responsive technology, with colour lenses, including orange and pink. This model strikes a perfect balance between functionality and style.

Product.title: ROUND DOUBLE BRIDGE LEGEN
Product.description: The new full metal round double bridge reinvents authentic DNA design to create an all-new Ray-Ban icon, disrupting the concept of iconic design with a revolutionary statement of must-have style.Featuring minimalistic volumes in easy to wear tones of gold or black and flat flash gradient lenses, this slick style offers contemporary individuals a passe-partout look with irresistible contemporary appeal – dress it up, or dress it down, a true icon knows no limits!

Product.title: RB9074S
Product.description: Made for the littlest legends, meet this model for babies and toddlers up to 6 years old. The playful rectangular shape comes in new opal, transparent and solid fun colors with dark solid lenses for maximum protection and unbeatable mini-me style. This model is protective and fashionable at the same time, as well as comfortable thanks to the rubber on the internal frame.

Product.title: RJ9069S
Product.description: Instantly recognizable and made even more irresistible through a Kid's version, Wayfarer has something unique. And this time it's even more special as a Limited Edition, dedicated to Save The Children’s 100th anniversary. Paired with gray mirror lenses and a dedicated engraving on the internal temple, this black frame comes in a red Ray‐Ban case with exclusive Save The Children box. All revenue will be donated to support Save the Children’s educational program.

Product.title: Ray-Ban Junior Sunglasses | Si
Product.description: An Enduring Ray-Ban classic designed for the superstar of the family. The rob is known for its smooth round shape and sophistication.

Product.title: RB8065 TITANIUM
Product.description: The butterfly transforms once more, this time into an edgier version of itself featured by Ray-Ban. This rimless oversized titanium frame is so light, we're adding it to our record book. Gaze into the future with crystal lenses in conspicuous executions, available in a range of options, from gradient to mirrored

Product.title: RB3674M SCUDERIA FERRARI
Product.description: Signature eyewear for speed freaks who live life in the fast lane. Contrasting colour options with air intake effect on the temples, and a range of lens options with Scuderia Ferrari shield logo. Worthy of champions.

Product.title: New Wayfarer
Product.description: sunglasses_explorers; sunglasses_men-s; sunglasses_new-arrivals; sunglasses_new_icons; sunglasses_polarized; sunglasses_view-all; sunglasses_wayfarer; sunglasses_women-s

Product.title: RB4369M SCUDERIA FERRARI
Product.description: A feat of design mastery, this frame is for eyewear what Scuderia Ferrari is for cars. Mold injected rims are joined by a slender double-bridge while the thin metal temples are tipped-off in Ferrari details. A stylish piece that won't go unoticed.

Product.title: Ray-Ban Sunglasses | Tortledov
Product.description: This unisex interpretation of the slim thalia stands out for its contemporary character. Pairing a Bold Profile with a Rounded Silhouette, Gina Carries a sharp sense of Sophistication.

Product.title: Ray-Ban Sunglasses | Transpare
Product.description: Get ready to meet the Mega Wayfarer, a new icon that makes modernity its own. The lifestyle evolution of the Original Wayfarer, the emblem of 60s rock and 80s art, it features a thicker shape to step into the megatrend with bold personality for new adventures with a younger perspective. Available in classic colours and in colourful transparent shades for a modern edge.

Product.title: RAY-BAN SUNGLASSES | SILVER SUNGLASSES
Product.description: What do you get when you cross a circle with a square? You get the hexagonal RB 3548N, the evolution of round featuring flat crystal lenses.Round meets flat, when it comes to lenses that is

Product.title: Ray-Ban Frames | Gunmetal Fram
Product.description: Elevate the everyday with new Geometrical 3-Piece Frames, Charged with a sense of light and space. Slim Lines lean into clean, contemporary style, while flex temples secure a comfortable fit.

Product.title: KRISTIN OPTICS BIO-BASED
Product.description: The RB7218 Ray-Ban Kristin Optics Bio-based eyeglasses are a truly sustainable choice. Made from bio-based acetate, this black frame have a polished finish. This vision of the future is a reminder that today's choices will determine tomorrow's possibilities.

Product.title: CHAD OPTICS BIO-BASED
Product.description: Ray-Ban RB7217 Chad Optics Bio-Based eyeglasses are a fresh update on the iconic rectangle frame made of acetate. This frame is designed for all genders and features clear lenses. The dark blue temples add a contemporary twist to this timeless style.

Product.title: Evolution
Product.description: New sof t shape characterized by its double bridge and slim metal structure Always the best choice for any look

Product.title: Clubmaster
Product.description: Clubmaster

Product.title: RB3689
Product.description: A sophisticated reboot of the legendary Aviator now with flat temples that can perfectly accommodate prescription lenses. A double bridge, metal with polished enamel coating, and the option for Evolve and polar lenses, ensure this legendary look checks every box.

Product.title: SQUARE 1973
Product.description: The '80s never leave us bored. With pleasure as lifestyle, they spoke to our innate desire to feel invincible. True golden years then, and now back with Honey Dijon's unique Wings II. A square and shiny metal frame with a single, large mirrored lens. All covered in 24K gold.

eyeglasses.descripation: Model Code:0RX7144MF60253wcs-half-top wcs-add-bottomThese frames build on the championship legacies of both Ferrari and Ray-Ban with ingenious design touches. Liteforce construction makes for featherweight yet durable frames, while the rubber-reinforced temple tips ensure a perfect fit. The addition of strong matte finishes and an engraved Scuderia Ferrari logo make look is ready for the winners circle.
Model Code:0RX5405MF60155Easy-to-wear shape with a slightly pronounced nylon browline makes this frame distinctively unisex while maintaining all the energy of the prancing horse.

Model Code:0RJ9060S71078G50The RJ9060S brings retro-cool to girls everywhere. Re-invented for kids from the Ray-Ban Erika, its a modern take on the panto shape from the 50s. This design features sleek metal temples and a soft touch rubberized front.

Model Code:0RX3682V309449Inspired by the iconic and made for the modern: meet our most loved shapes reiterpreted. This geometrical optical model makes a statement with a lightweight structure. Features a metal structure with injected temple tips for maximum confort. This model is fashionable, wearable and affordable all in one. Available in five colors ranging from classic metal to rose gold.

Model Code:0RX7199520452 Leading the way since 1937, Ray-Ban was born to break the boundaries of style, tech and functionally. Lifestyle meets performance in this optical shape. Made from ultralight and resistant Peek materials, get ready to better your best every day. Available in five sand colorful options.

Model Code:0RX6413250256Discover your signature look with sharp new pilot opticals. The thin metal frame and double bridge form a strong structure and come in gold, silver, or gunmetal finishes. Vibrant enamel accents on the rims add a contemporary pop of color, finishing off this modern frame that is sure to turn heads.

Offering a fresh take on the classic round shape, the Jack leads tradition on a new adventure. Available in many frame colours, from gold to light brown, this slim metal frame structure has a contemporary roundish shape, available in an enamelled version. You will love to wear it.

Wear RB3025 Aviator Gradient sunglasses with a gunmetal frame and lens treatments including crystal Polarized Sunglasses blue gradient, crystal gradient grey and crystal brown gradient.

Designed to become an instant legend, Leonard is the new iconic model with an effortlessly styled shape. Available in a variety of lens and frame colour combinations, from black to Havana frames and from green to brown lenses. Find your look to be comfort and stylish wherever you wear them.

For a statement making shape that no one can ignore, look no further than these new classics. Gold frames are brought to life in black, brown, bordeaux, orange, blue and light grey rim styles while multi-colored lenses offer fresh and totally unique appeal.

A daring, bold approach to eyewear, preferred by leaders, innovators, taste-makers, and those who don’t settle for mediocre. A sophisticated flat double bridge in classic gold, black, silver, gunmetal and contemporary light bronze makes an immediate impression, while new angles and sleek flat temples are designed to last. The hexagonal frames are unexpected yet supremely comfortable to wear, making this a look perfect for only the most fearless and cool.
Welcome the Jim, with its new geometric shape leaving no doubts on its iconicity of the late 80’s. The slim metal frame gives an up to date touch to heritage style.

An archive original is back and ready for the modern era to recall 60s self expression. Ultracool shape and sharp look of this acetate frame is a nod to the past in forward motion.

Ray-Ban Clubmaster Folding sunglasses combine unmistakable retro style with a new functional design. This foldable version of the Clubmaster can be easily folded and stored for ultimate convenience - although we know you'll want to permanently showcase them! Clubmaster Folding RB2176 sunglasses are as timeless and fashionable today as when they were first introduced and became the sunglass of choice of counter-culture intellectuals. Offered in a variety of frame colors and lens treatments, including polarized lenses, these retro sunglasses blend iconic design, practicality and style to create the ultimate statement-making folding sunglasses.

Straight from the ‘90s vault, the Frank vintage frame is perfect for adding a touch of edge to any look. Available in gold, black, and silver metal frames, coupled with acetate temple tips for a sleek finish, it comes in a variety of lens options, ranging from classic colours to contemporary polar blue and purple. The Legend Gold Ray-Ban logo graces the lenses with gilded everlasting style.

Revel in retro charm with this classic narrow shape, featuring fine premium accents. The thicker profile is finished with a fine pattern to the temples and bridge , recalling Ray-Ban's rich heritage.
Slim lines define this new metal bar construction, instilling an enhanced sense of light and space. Simple and refined, it features a linear temple tip with a metal cap at the head of the temple.
Softening the sharp angles of the bestselling Hexagonal, This new metal frame features a 1996 archive temple and visible Ray-Ban Logo. Cool and Considered, A thicker Profile feels fresh for today.
